        Description copied from interface: IRtMaterial
        Compute the colour of a surface as seen from a specific direction.
        Specified by:
        getColor in interface IRtMaterial
        Parameters:
        rgb - (RGBf, modified) The computed colour at the surface.
        intersection - (RayIntersection, readonly) The description of the surface - location, orientation, material, etc.
        lights - (IRtLight[], readonly) The light in the scene that may affect the intersection.
        rtObjects - (IRtGeometry[], readonly) The objects in the scene.
        bkg - (RGBf, readonly) The background color.
        nMaxBounce - (int, readonly) The maximum reflective bounces.
